http://www.advfilms.com/titles/moeyoken/
http://www.mmv.co.jp/products/flyer/moeyo_ken/

Those are supposed to be the female offspring of Kondo, OKita and 
Hijikata....now the problem is what about the rest of the Shinsengumi?
HOw would their daughters look like?

::secretarytocapt3 imagining:::
Shimada Kai's daughter = always wearing sweats, very athletic tall 
and full bodied

Itou's girl = evil manipulative sexy vixen who enjoys tormenting the 
other Shinsengumi daughters

Nagakura's daugher = annoying loud mouth gal who has a persecution 
complex and cannot take orders.  Any well meaning criticism results 
in extremely defensive behaviour.  Very rebellious girl who ends up 
in kinshin all the time.

Nakajima Nobori's daugher = very quiet, has pet plants and loves to 
draw ofcourse.  If someone accidently kills any of her green 
friends...she unleashes a temper you don't even want to imagine.

Saitou's daughter....

submit your designs for Moeyoken-ish characters!
